name: Alif
description:
Alif, a puzzle  game with original art, storyline and game mechanics.It is meant to be a poetic little journey describing the story of the letter Alif.

Made by GreenSide Team, Algeria.
For 6wrni Game Jam2 hosted by Oussama Dib.

By Rekik Sid Ahmed
Senoussaoui Lakhdar. (sgreen)
Everything from scratch except for music : Ancient Arabian Music - Camel Riders
